means: 眨眼睛( blink的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_cn: 他眼睛飞快地眨个不停。

sentence.Network_en: He is a person who blinks responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个漠视责任的人.

sentence.Network_en: I get time off when Joe blinks.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔眨眼时我就能休息片刻.

闪烁突袭（Blink Strike）：瞬间移动到敌方单位身边对他进行攻击，对其进行攻击时幻影刺客被动地提升100%的攻击速度。 施法距离…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from blinkin the sense 'momentary gleam of light' (referring to the small flowers)

entry.def: When you blink or when you blink your eyes, you shut your eyes and very quickly open them again.

example.ex: Kathryn blinked and forced  a smile...
example.tran: 凯瑟琳眨了眨眼睛，挤出一丝微笑。

entry.def: When a light blinks, it flashes on and off.

example.ex: Green and yellow lights blinked on the surface of the harbour...
example.tran: 海港的水面上闪烁着绿色和黄色的灯光。

entry.tran: 一眨眼的工夫；转眼之间；瞬间
entry.def: If you say that something happens in the blink of an eye, you mean that it happens very quickly.

example.ex: It was all over in the blink of an eye.
example.tran: 转眼之间，一切都结束了。

entry.tran: （机器）不能正常工作，出故障，出毛病
entry.def: If a machine goes on the blink, it stops working properly.

example.ex: ...an old TV that's on the blink.

means.word_mean: 1. small Indian lettuce of northern regions
